Text: Thank you STFmaryville. Just 4 more issue till the end! DO you know if Morrisson's last issue has extra pages?

well Ahlat, only 3. #13 is the finale and according to DC (so far) it's only 32 pages. although there's a variant cover drawn by... grant morrison?

hey where was our source Scanbro yesterday? do you think he got scared by the publicity?

thank you soooooooo much!!!!
I know you'll upload them as soon as they come out and I always come here to find them. Thank you!
( I really can't get them where I live :/ )

Yeah, he did. He posted syaing he's going to lay low for a while now.
Also I was counting this issue as I hadn't read it yet. But a variant by Grant Morrisson! I've definitely got to get that.
This is what Scanbro said "I guess I'll go hide in my bunker for awhile until the heat cools down. Thanks for nothing Rich Johnston! "

lol poor guy! (or girl!) i liked one comment i read though, which was something like "marvel's really going to be pissed when he leaks age of ultron #10 in a few weeks"

ironically, if he had done any/all of it without attaching a "handle" (the Scanbro name), other than monitoring 4chan no one would conclusively know it was the same single person. so i sort of feel that Scanbro, by creating an identity, put a target on himself/herself.
Yeah he did. I personally think he should have stayed anonymous, but he said there people pretending to be him that's why he took the moniker.

Thanks, again, Mr. STFmaryville!

Are you uploading the Image stuff that came out this week?
you're welcome Oneiromancer12, and yes, sometime between now and friday morning. have only downloaded 1 of them so far...
